title: Tsumamigui 3 The Animation
synopsis: Akito Natsuki decides to spend his one month long summer holiday in his home town after his workplace closes down for renovations. With no money and nothing to do he decides to take it easy.
characters: ['Asatsuyu, Sayoko', 'Natsuki, Miyuri', 'Natsuki, Akito', 'Yoshizawa, Takeo', 'Jinno, Ai', 'Jinno, Sumire', 'Natsuki, Kazuto']
